channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
channel.description:
Class Type: Neutral Offensive
Day Ability 1: (3 uses)
Annoyance - Distracts 3 people for 8 seconds (Without telling them)
Day Ability 2: (2 uses)
Pain Relief Wine : Makes anyone immune including self. (Excluding the King)
Night Ability 1: (2 uses)
Planning a Party - Selects 3 people to occupy for tonight
Night Ability 2 (2 uses)
Social Event - Selects 3 people to talk anonymously to each other
Goal: Is to survive till the end
Lore: TODO

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
item.dc:creator: _PG_Felgurity
item.description:
Okay, I see what you are talking about. I also thought of this, but it is an interesting idea so I’m going to keep it here.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
@JammySplodge I follow you, but it’s an interesting concept that can be developed and improved upon.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
I don’t understand any of these abilities how does making people talk help you further your goal in any way

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Annoyance is like the alch blur. it will be used to confirm yourself rather than to actually distract people. Make it only target 1 person so that the Assassin can fake it at the very least. Otherwise make it not notify them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Party Planner
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
interesting! - I like it, It’s not too simple, yet it looks challenging!!

Read full topic
